item.title: ATC TRANSPONDERS AND AUTOMATIC ALTITUDE REPORTING SYSTEMS – ADS-B SQUITTER TRANSMISSIONS

numlitem.para: Operations do not require its use, and
Repairs are made prior to completion of the next heavy maintenance visit.
Flight Control to ensure ADS-B Out is not required along planned route. (e.g. Hudson Bay, etc.). Reference IOM Communications Section for Limitations and Procedures.

placard.para: Placard near Transponder Selector Switch: "ADS-B INOP”. Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
